meaningMnemonic:
If 真似 is <kanji>imitation</kanji> and if a <kanji>monkey</kanji> is doing said imitation, that's summed up by the saying: <vocabulary>monkey see monkey do</vocabulary>.

This refers to when someone does a <vocabulary>mindless imitation</vocabulary> of others without any real thought, so is often used when criticizing people.
readingMnemonic: The readings are 猿 plus 真似 put together.
